entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of drizzle. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning.
